#summary truncate(text[length,truncateString])
#labels api,0.8,view,helper

*Description*:

Truncates a string to the specified length and replaces the last characters with the specified truncate string (defaults to '...').

*Return Type*:

String

*

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *text* || string || true ||  || Text to truncate. ||
|| *length* || numeric || false || 30 || Length of the truncated string. ||
|| *truncateString* || string || false || ... || String to replace the last characters with. ||



*Examples*:

{{{
<cfoutput>#truncate(text="Wheels is a framework for ColdFusion", length=20)#</cfoutput>

}}}
